  • Inherited from EventDispatcher.addEventListener

    • Defined in base/Event.ts:122

    Adds event listener of specified type.

    Parameters

    • type: string | string[]

      event type to listen, it can be one type or a list of type.

    • listener: IEventListener<Event>

      a listener which be invoked if an event with this specified type is dispatching.

    current object itself for chain calls.
